patthana16.16:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ
patthana16.16:1.1_1: cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittaṁ
patthana16.16:1.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.16:1.1_3: paṭicca naakusalo nacitto ca naabyākato nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:1.1_4: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti

patthana16.16:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ
patthana16.16:3.1_1: cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ
patthana16.16:3.1_2: cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana16.16:4.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.16:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
